name: Cursed sarcophagus
description:
Cursed sarcophagus is an addictive 3D puzzle game where you have to lower sarcophagi on or off the island!

Magic enveloped the kingdom and cursed sarcophagi appeared on the islands. No one knows where they came from or what harm they can cause. Take control of the situation and do whatever is necessary to secure the kingdom!

In the game you will find many different levels and blocks that you have to destroy! Complete the game from start to finish, solving interesting puzzles! Whether you can walk this path depends only on you!

Game Features:
- Many levels
- Convenient controls
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
